author: rwaldhoff
msg: apply patch suggested by Lee Breisacher in http://nagoya.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=19192, don't syncorhonize around the ObjectFactory.makeObject call in addObject.

author: rwaldhoff
msg: apply Anna Kreglewska's patch to bug 17990, fixing sync problem in returnObject

author: rwaldhoff
msg: fix issue 18062 by throwing NoSuchElementException when an newly created object is invalid.  This prevents an endless loop caused by invalid factory configuration.

author: rwaldhoff
msg: Apply Scott Finnerty's patch supporting a max idle of 0.
Also made similar change to GenericKeyedObjectPool
